name: 彭朋群　教師諮商時間(Office Hours)
objective: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
schedule:
Measuring
Straight Line Motion
Vector Quantities
Two- and- Three-Dimensional Motion
Newton's Laws of Motion
Friction,Drag and Centripetal Force
Work-Kinetic Energy Theorem
Conservation of Energy
Center of Mass and Momentum
Rotational Motion I
Rotational Motion II
Equilibrium, Indeterminate Structures
Newtonian Gravitation
Fluid Statics and Dynamics
Simple Harmonic Motion
Transverse Waves
